// Horror's Least - PvP (pvp)
//notes: GODROLL ALERT! An upgrade Piece of Mind essentially with a bit more range and stability. Honestly only go for the Adept as the perks aren't much better pvp wise. Kill clip is the draw on this thing for more damage tags:pvp

// Under Your Skin (pve)
//notes: As close as a bow can get to a machine gun so far. Great add clear potential with rapid fire shots, especial for end game content. Craft the others tuff you want later on when you unlock it. tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=232928045&perks=201365942,2652708987
dimwishlist:item=232928045&perks=201365942,617966211
dimwishlist:item=232928045&perks=3523746922,2652708987
dimwishlist:item=232928045&perks=3523746922,617966211


// Under Your Skin (pve)
//notes: #Adds clear. #PvE great AoE damage here. Either explosive for champions or dragonfly for mini-trinity ghoul that doesn't take up your exotic slot. Later on craft fastest drawtime or accuracy you can. tags:pve

// Eyasluna - PvP Great (pvp)
//notes: Perpetual Motion or outlaw/Kill Clip to two tap with team or any other damage boost. For Picky go for more range rounds, High Cal being best. Still need more picky? Range Masterwork. Finally, sights should be Fast draw for best mix of perks but sight is the perfection chaser. Any range masterwork over that sight matters more. tags:pvp

// Eyasluna - PvE Build (pve)
//notes: This will replace your Vulculpea with Headstone since 140s just dominate 180s for high end content. 180s really only nice for normal playlist with adds but 140s can do work on champs in nightfalls. Any Headstone roll good to synergize with stasis here. Best Range and Stability you can get with scope and barrel. For third column either rapid hit or outlaw up to personal preference, but perpetual motion isn't bad either if you don't have either and keep moving. tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=235827225&perks=124408337


// Cantata-57 - PvP Godroll Alert potential (pvp,god-pvp)
//notes: Currently the best handcannon. Better than palindrome, etc. Suros synergy origin trait plays a lot here. Take your pick but eye of the storm/Heating Up and opening shot/range finder are probably slightly the best. Most agree Eye of the Storm and Rangefinder are the godroll with masterwork range for max range. Masterwork Range. tags:pvp,god-pvp

// Perses-D - PvP (pvp)
//notes: With the recent sandbox changes in Season of the Haunted 150 Scout rifles become great. This thing won't out shine the exotic Jade Rabbit, but it actually has better handling depending on the roll so could be snappier. The only second column perk you want here is explosive payload to get that flinch and push the range damage further. Opening shot can work if you have a solid barrel and rounds with perpetual or rapid hit. You want to push the handling and stability has high as possible to stay on target. Recommend Stability or Handling Masterwork tags:pvp

// The Summoner - PvP (pvp)
//notes: Great PvP Auto-rifle best in game, except the adept version of course. Especially with Alacrity great for solo play like rumble or trials when people die. For specific Trials/Rumble, Celerity is useful. Other than that rangefinder (shows in both columns) is great. You want rangefinder in third col so fourth can be multi-kill clip or rampage. Wellspring/Harmony in 4th are ok backups with utility. Third col if you don't have rangefinder here, Heating up/Perpetual motion both good, with Moving target next option for aim assist. Any other perks are ok to keep until you get these rolls. For other mods, range and stability in that order, masterwork range/stability, or reload if you like snappy reloads. tags:pvp

Arrowhead brake all the way. rounds should be best range, and heating up in the perfect third column but the perpetual motion is second best. Moving target to keep sticky headshots and for your mod, put on the counter balance stock if you didn't get the 85-90 recoil direction otherwise your choice of Icarus for jumping or sprint grip for run n' gun. tags:pvp,god-pvp

// Aisha's Embrace - PvE (pve)

// Aisha's Embrace - PvP Roll (pvp)
//notes: As far as Rapid Fire frames go, this competes with servant leader with some better PvP Options. You'll want Alacrity for Trials where where you can be the last one standing. Other than that put on one quiet moment. Best option here is tunnel vision/Multi-kill clip, perpetual motion is also decent third slot pick. Last column vorpal or eye of the storm depending on what you need it for though eye of the storm is generally better since rapid fire frames don't crack down super users. If you want that use Dead Man's Tale with Vorpal. For barrels and rounds/mag go for highest range, with stability as the second priority. Masterwork range or Stability depending on other mods. tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=2638190703&perks=2946784966,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=2638190703&perks=2946784966,2458213969
dimwishlist:item=2638190703&perks=2946784966,699525795
dimwishlist:item=2638190703&perks=1428297954,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=2638190703&perks=1428297954,2458213969
dimwishlist:item=2638190703&perks=1428297954,699525795

If you play more aggressive kill clip is a good damage perk, but there is definitely synergy to be had here with the demo/adrenaline or grave robber/swash combos. Perpetual/Rangefinder is the perk combo to hunt this season. Masterwork Range. tags:pvp

// Aisha's Embrace (Adept) - PvP (pvp)
//notes: As far as Rapid Fire frames go, this competes with servant leader with some better PvP Options. You'll want Alacrity for Trials where where you can be the last one standing. Other than that put on one quiet moment. Best option here is tunnel vision/Multi-kill clip, perpetual motion is also decent third slot pick. Last column vorpal or eye of the storm depending on what you need it for though eye of the storm is generally better since rapid fire frames don't crack down super users. If you want that use Dead Man's Tale with Vorpal. For barrels and rounds/mag go for highest range, with stability as the second priority. Masterwork range or Stability depending on other mods. tags:pvp

// The Summoner (Adept) - PvP (pvp,god-pvp)
//notes: Great PvP Auto-rifle best in game, except the adept version of course. Especially with Alacrity great for solo play like rumble or trials when people die. For specific Trials/Rumble, Celerity is useful. Other than that rangefinder (shows in both columns) is great. You want rangefinder in third col so fourth can be multi-kill clip or rampage. Wellspring/Harmony in 4th are ok backups with utility. Third col if you don't have rangefinder here, Heating up/Perpetual motion both good, with Moving target next option for aim assist. Any other perks are ok to keep until you get these rolls. For other mods, range and stability in that order, masterwork range/stability, or reload if you like snappy reloads. Best PvP auto with the recommended rolls overall. tags:pvp,god-pvp
